preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM usm_permissions where permission in ('secrets-delete','secrets-create','secrets-update');

changeSet.sql: UPDATE usm_permission_api SET api = REGEXP_REPLACE(api, '^/api/aip/secrets/', '/api/secrets/') WHERE permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM usm_permissions WHERE permission IN ('secrets-create', 'secrets-delete', 'secrets-update') ) AND api LIKE '/api/aip/secrets/%';
